author: tphuang @tphuang
text:
So, requirement to win a war next to China has broken USN procurement?
If SM-6 is minimum for defending against PLA's hypersonic threat, then any CRUDES operating in the theater must have at least 48? MK-41 cells to provide provide AAW/ASW as well as Land attack mission capabilities.
+ High power generation to track omni-direction threat matrix on its large radar.

A fleet of specialized ships is bad operational flexibility, so you can only have a large & medium sized mutli-role surface warship so that can operate for long period of time away from home base (due to US military's global commitment).

USN changed 85% of FREMM after it became apparent that it is not survivable in westpac conflict. LCS are useless.

Current Burkes are maxed out hulls & expensive, but they are the only "survivable" escort for carriers in westpac. There are 78 burkes, but the 28 Flight 1+2s are at least 26 yrs old & have been over-used on many deployments. What are their availability like in a high intensity conflict?

You also can't keep all the active ones in westpac bc LCS is not suitable for any dangerous theater.

A good short term strategy is to just continue building Burkes to replace all the retiring ships. But Type 055 is clearly better & has plenty of room for further upgrade.

So, USN needs a Burke replacement. Which likely will go vastly over-budget like Zumwalt class. Hard to see how USN capital ship count does not go down significantly.
